description: DSC resource to re-use Microsoft InTune custom compliance scripts.

embedded.title: InTuneCompliance
embedded.description: DSC resource to re-use Microsoft InTune custom compliance scripts.
embedded.markdownDescription: DSC resource to re-use Microsoft InTune custom compliance scripts.

JSON.description: File path to the JSON file.
JSON.markdownDescription: File path to the JSON file.

Script.description: File path to the Script file.
Script.markdownDescription: File path to the Script file.

SettingName.description: The name of the custom setting to use for base compliance. This name is case-sensitive.
SettingName.markdownDescription: The name of the custom setting to use for base compliance. This name is case-sensitive.

Operator.description: Represents a specific action that is used to build a compliance rule.
Operator.markdownDescription:
Represents a specific action that is used to build a compliance rule.
Supported operators:
 - IsEquals
 - NotEquals
 - GreaterThan
 - GreaterEquals
 - LessThan
 - LessEquals

DataType.description: The type of data that you can use to build your compliance rule.
DataType.markdownDescription:
The type of data that you can use to build your compliance rule.
Supported types:
 - Boolean
 - Int64
 - Double
 - String
 - DateTime
 - Version

Operand.description: Represent the values that the operator works on.
Operand.markdownDescription: Represent the values that the operator works on.

MoreInfoUrl.description: A URL that’s shown to device users so they can learn more about the compliance requirement when their device is noncompliant for a setting. You can also use this to link to instructions to help users bring their device into compliance for this setting.
MoreInfoUrl.markdownDescription: A URL that’s shown to device users so they can learn more about the compliance requirement when their device is noncompliant for a setting. You can also use this to link to instructions to help users bring their device into compliance for this setting.

RemediationStrings.description: Information that gets displayed when a device is noncompliant to a setting. This information is intended to help users understand the remediation options to bring a device to a compliant state. There must be at least one string.
RemediationStrings.markdownDescription: Information that gets displayed when a device is noncompliant to a setting. This information is intended to help users understand the remediation options to bring a device to a compliant state. There must be at least one string.
